pageProps.content:
Experience

Saseka is the Tsonga word for Beautiful. Set in the north-eastern portion of the game-rich Thornybush Nature Reserve in the Greater Kruger, Saseka is elegantly positioned on the banks of the Monwana dry-riverbed.
The lodge is state-of-the-art, luxurious & imbued with the idyllic African wilderness. Saseka’s design means it is suitable for couples on a romantic journey as well as families with children.

Stay

It is a small & intimate camp: there are only 8 tented suites plus a 2-bedroom villa.
Each suite overlooks the seasonal Monwana River, which is sometimes sandy & dry, sometimes flowing, but always attractive to wildlife. Wonderful wildlife sightings are often seen from the comfort of the suites’ private viewing decks.
Each suite also boasts a private plunge pool & an outdoor shower.
The 2-bedroom Leadwood Villa operates as an intimate, camp-within-a-camp, servicing 1, 2 or 3 tented suites exclusively. The villa has a private & central entertainment area that is separate from the rest of the lodge, featuring a lounge & dining room.

Activities

Morning & afternoon game drives are conducted in open 4x4 vehicles & led by experienced rangers & trackers who share a passion for the bush & the environment.
Guests can also enjoy relaxing treatments at the Mobile Amani Spa or book a scenic hot air balloon flight over the Blyde River at an additional cost.
Community village visits can also be arranged.

subfolders.title: Jackalberry Lodge
subfolders.description: Jackalberry Lodge is named after the jackalberry tree, a bushveld icon that provides shade & protection from predators.  Like its namesake, the lodge offers guests a tranquil safari experience in understated elegance. With a prime location in the Thornybush Nature Reserve, Jackalberry Lodge provides the perfect environment to reconnect with wild Africa against the backdrop of the Northern Drakensberg.

subfolders.title: Kubili House
subfolders.description: Kubili House is a 26,900 sq foot private residence set within the Thornybush Game Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park.  The house boasts a spectacular location on the bank of the largest dam in the reserve, attracting a variety of wildlife & birds. This private safari residence offers a safari lifestyle with a dedicated game ranger, vehicle & chef, ensuring personalized service & complete privacy.  There is no set safari program at Kubili House.  Instead, activities are tailored to guests’ requirements.

subfolders.title: Monwana Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated in a quiet corner in the renowned Thornybush Game Reserve, Monwana Lodge offers wildlife encounters that will take your breath away. This area is home to a variety of animals, including the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – as well other game like zebra, impala, giraffe, cheetah & many bird species.

subfolders.title: N'Kaya Lodge
subfolders.description: Adjacent to the Kruger National Park, in the heart of the Thornybush Game Reserve, you will find the intimate & exclusive N’Kaya Lodge.   N’Kaya offers its guests the absolute best in privacy & is the ideal destination for a relaxing & peaceful African safari.  Frequent Big 5 sightings can be expected.

subfolders.title: Royal Malewane
subfolders.description: Royal Malewane is located within the beautiful Thornybush Game Reserve, a private concession deep in the heart of the Greater Kruger region. The lodge oozes luxury, style & elegance & provides guests with a grand safari experience where only the best china, service, food & wildlife can be enjoyed.

subfolders.title: Saseka Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Saseka is the Tsonga word for Beautiful.  Set in the north-eastern portion of the game-rich Thornybush Nature Reserve in the Greater Kruger, Saseka is elegantly positioned on the banks of the Monwana dry-riverbed.   The lodge is state-of-the-art, luxurious & imbued with the idyllic African wilderness.  Saseka’s design means it is suitable for couples on a romantic journey as well as families with children.

subfolders.title: Serondella Lodge
subfolders.description: Serondella Lodge is located within the Thornbush Game Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park in South Africa & is home to the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino. Right in front of the lodge, an active waterhole invites plenty of wildlife to come & drink during the day.  Because of the ideal location, guests often have excellent game viewing opportunities from the comfort of their viewing decks.

subfolders.title: Shumbalala Game Lodge
subfolders.description: Deep in the heart of the African bushveld, lies Shumbalala Lodge – a luxurious safari camp set in a quiet corner of the Thornybush Game Reserve in South Africa. Everything at Shumbalala is out of this world.  From the personalized service, romantic atmosphere, spacious suites & spectacular wildlife viewing, Shumbalala never fails to impress.

subfolders.title: Tamboti Villa
subfolders.description: Tamboti Villa is an exclusive-use safari haven nestled under a grove of Tamboti trees in the game-packed Thornybush Private Game Reserve. This private 4-bedroom villa comes with a dedicated chef, ranger & tracker – ensuring an exclusive safari experience in a relaxed setting.

subfolders.title: Thornybush Game Lodge
subfolders.description: Thornybush Game Lodge, a luxurious, family-friendly lodge in the Thornybush Game Reserve offers an exhilarating Big 5 safari experience to their guests. The lodge overlooks the seasonal Monwana River as well as a large waterhole, so guests can enjoy matchless wildlife viewing from the comfort of the viewing deck.

subfolders.title: Thornybush The River Lodge
subfolders.description: Thornybush The River Lodge is located within the Thornybush Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park & enjoys beautiful views over the seasonal Monwana River. The River Lodge offers a truly personalized, secluded wilderness experience – a seamless blend of Big encounters & 5-star luxury that restores body & soul.

subfolders.title: Waterbuck Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated on a dammed estuary in a high-water table area – Waterbuck Lodge has the ideal location in the heart of the Thornybush Game Reserve in South Africa. This is the ideal destination to experience the abundance of life that water attracts – including the largest elephant herd in the reserve.

whatWeLoveItems: Prime location in a top private reserve
Matchless Big 5 game viewing around the Monwana River
Exclusive & intimate camp – ideal for romantic travel
